Medik8 C-Tetra® Eye

Brand: Medik8

Category: Anti Aging

Ingredients: Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Limonene, Citral, Linalool, Geraniol.

Directions: Apply around eyes, leave on

Directions: Apply around eyes, leave on

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
